name: Mini Battle Ground
description:
Welcome to the Mini Battle Ground, here is where you can act as a soldier in front line, fight with various types of enemies, collect resources, earn advanced weapon for yourself and deploy more friendly units! And, don't forget to destroy the enemies' commander and protect ours.

Main features:

Intelligent enemy AI will attack your base from different paths.
6 types of firearms and 4 type of enemies.
Deploy soldiers to destroy the enemy base.
